name: places/ChIJG_v6tQVZwokR_PxjjK4vTYw
formattedAddress: 225 E 36th St #20a, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 225 E 36th St #20a, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Nicole = awesome. As a energetic (relative) youngster with a ton of goals, she worked with me to prioritize, focus, attack, and knock those goals out like bowling pins that never stood a chance. As a guy who's addicted to thinking (and over-thinking) about everything, not a session went by where Nicole would make a suggestion and I'd go, "Oh. Huh. I...didn't think of that!" and success ensued. New apartment. New job. Better health. The list is ridic. She's fun, she's cool, she's a whirlwind of motivational energy that I challenge anyone to get caught up in.

originalText.text: WOW! What a brilliant mentor Nicole is. She is in the business of overhauling your bad habits for good, not just for a quick fix. And she has an effortless knack for allowing you to believe that YOU made the decisions to convert the unhelpful habits into helpful habits...she didn't shove some system down your throat, because how long will that last, right? With her approach, the new good habits will prevail over the long haul. But the bottom line is that, even though you FEEL you're in the driver's seat, she is always there with her wisdom, knowledge and invaluable insight when the moment calls for it. Add in her fabulous sense of humor, to keep things fun, and that's how it WORKS, folks. Her approach WORKS :-)

originalText.text:
I found Nicole while searching the internet on how to break the sugar addiction, which lead me to her blog and then to her Healthy Habits Coaching Club(HHCC).  She and the Club have been a godsend to me.  Nicole is so warm, enthusiastic, and knowledgeable about healthy, positive living.  She has such an affirmative and encouraging coaching style, which I particularly appreciate and benefit from.  I find much of the same kind of interaction among the other members of the HHCC.

What is so great is that while Nicole advocates and herself adheres to a Plant Based diet, she does NOT cram it down anyone's throat, or make you feel like a horrible person if you are not.  She simply gives very well informed and documented information and allows us to make our own choices, without critcism or judgement.  That is another wonderful thing about the HHCC, many of us in the Club are on different journeys or at different places in our journey, yet we can all support one another and be motivated by others, all under Nicole's mentoring and coaching.  I CANNOT say enough how much I recommend Nicole's coaching either privately or within the HHCC.  If you have struggled and tried every diet known to man and still can't get "there" or feel good about yourself, this is the place for you!
